Class Raytracer.ListParameter<T extends Raytracer.Tweakable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.ParameterControl
      • Raytracer.ListParameter<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    public class Raytracer.ListParameter<T extends Raytracer.Tweakable>
extends Raytracer.ParameterControl
    A dynamically generated GUI element that manages an ArrayList of Raytracer.Tweakables and their individual GUI controls. Uses a dropdown menu to select which object in the list is currently being controlled.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListParameter

        ListParameter​(java.lang.Object obj,
              java.lang.String fieldName,
              java.lang.String labelText,
              java.util.ArrayList<T> items)
        Creates a ListParameter.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object that contains the field to be controlled.
        fieldName - the name of the field on the object that this should control. Should be of type ArrayList<T>.
        labelText - the text displayed beside the control.
        items - the list of items to be shown in the dropdown menu.

    • Method Detail

      • createGUIControls

        public int createGUIControls​(g4p_controls.GWindow window,
                             int x,
                             int y)
        Description copied from class: Raytracer.ParameterControl
        Creates and draws the G4P GUI elements on the window.
        Specified by:
        createGUIControls in class Raytracer.ParameterControl
        Parameters:
        window - the window to draw the GUI elements on.
        x - the x position within the window for the left edge of the GUI elements.
        y - the y position within the window for the top edge of the GUI elements.
        Returns:
        the vertical height of the GUI elements drawn, in number of pixels.
